Package Algorithms

Class SortingAndSearchingArray

java.lang.Object
Algorithms.SortingAndSearchingArray
public class SortingAndSearchingArray extends Object
SortingAndSearchingArray contains several methods that implement sorting and searching algorithms based on arrays.

    • linearSearch

      public static <T extends Comparable<? super T>> boolean linearSearch(T[] data, int min, int max, T target)
      Searches the specified array of objects using a linear search algorithm.
      Parameters:
      data - the array to be searched
      min - the integer representation of the minimum value
      max - the integer representation of the maximum value
      target - the element being searched for
      Returns:
      true if the desired element is found
